info: The project will address unsustainable watershed management in four priority river basins of the country. The project will be implemented as a sector loan to institutionalize effective watershed management regimes in four upper river basins (URBs) that can be replicated across the country. The four URBs are (i) Chico River Basin in Cordillera Administrative Region (CAR), Northern Luzon island, (ii) Wahig-Inabanga on the island of Bohol, (iii) Lake Lanao Basin in the Autonomous Region of Muslim Mindanao (ARMM) and Upper Bukidnon River Basin in Bukidnon (the latter two on the island of Mindanao).
name: INTEGRATED NATURAL RESOURCES AND ENVIRONMENTAL MANAGEMENT PROJECT
